markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shadow's Web](/Feats.aspx?ID=6035) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 126 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Clinging Shadows Initiate](/Feats.aspx?ID=6010)

</column>

---

You can launch a wave of shadowy qi outward from your body, damaging your opponents and potentially binding them in place. You gain the [_shadow's web_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2063) qi spell.
name: Shadow's Web
